department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.ch: Through a series of recent breakthroughs, deep learning has boosted the entire field of machine learning. This course intends to teach students simple, efficient tools to implement programs capable of learning from data.
goal.en: Through a series of recent breakthroughs, deep learning has boosted the entire field of machine learning. This course intends to teach students simple, efficient tools to implement programs capable of learning from data.

outline.ch:
Introduction to Artificial Neural Networks with Keras
Training Deep Neural Networks
Vision Using Convolutional Neural Networks
Sequences Using RNNs and CNNs
Learning and Generative Learning Using Autoencoders and GANs
Reinforcement Learning
outline.en:
Introduction to Artificial Neural Networks with Keras
Training Deep Neural Networks
Vision Using Convolutional Neural Networks
Sequences Using RNNs and CNNs
Learning and Generative Learning Using Autoencoders and GANs
Reinforcement Learning

textbook.ch:
Aurélien Géron, Hands-On Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn, Keras, and TensorFlow: Concepts, Tools, and Techniques to Build Intelligent Systems, 2nd Ed., Oct. 2019. O'Reilly Media.
ISBN-13: 978-1492032649
textbook.en:
Aurélien Géron, Hands-On Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn, Keras, and TensorFlow: Concepts, Tools, and Techniques to Build Intelligent Systems, 2nd Ed., Oct. 2019. O'Reilly Media.
ISBN-13: 978-1492032649

officeHour.en: W 5:00P – 6:00P, F 4:00P – 5:00P, and others by appointment

flexDiscription.ch: The extra two weeks will be used for makeup classes.
flexDiscription.en: The extra two weeks will be used for makeup classes.

domain.en: 人工智慧、資料科學與多媒體研究群

ch.competencies: 資訊應用與解決問題之能力
創新及獨立思考之能力
溝通協調與團隊合作能力
瞭解資訊潮流與國際趨勢
終身學習與自我成長之能力
